But she hasnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t changed the overall approach. So whether youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re new to VB developmentÃ¢â‚¬Â¦or youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re upgrading to VB 2012 and need an up-to-date referenceÃ¢â‚¬Â¦youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll find that this book is packed with the information you need, delivered in a way thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s made earlier editions such favorites among professional developers:

Who this book is for
This book is for anyone who wants to learn how to use VB 2012 to develop Windows Forms applications:

And even though the focus is on Windows Forms, the skills youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll gain will apply to any .NET applicationÃ¢â‚¬Â¦whether for Windows, the web, or mobile devices.
